Before you make any final decision, explore more about this car: Variants Mileage Colors Specs Price Images Related search Recently Updated Mahindra Scorpio Mahindra Bolero Camper Mahindra BOLERO PikUP ExtraStrong View 12 More Popular Cars Mahindra XUV 3XO Mahindra Scorpio N Mahindra Scorpio View 4 More Electric Cars Mahindra XEV 9e Mahindra BE 6 Mahindra XUV400 EV Petrol Cars Mahindra Thar Mahindra Thar ROXX Mahindra XUV700 View 2 More Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Contact Us Sitemap', 'images': [], 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://cargraze.com/blog/2025-mahindra-xuv-3xo-specs-design-performance-and-safety', 'content': '2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety  | Cargraze Home Cars Car Blog Tools Loan EMI Calculator Mileage Calculator Sell Used Car Check RC Login/ Register Home Car Info 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specs, Design, Performance, and Safety Published On Dec 24, 2024 By Cargraze for Car Info A Comprehensive Review of the Mahindra XUV 3XO in 2025: Features, Performance, and Value Are you looking for a compact yet powerful vehicle that combines performance, safety, and value in one stunning package? The Mahindra XUV 3XO might be the car youre searching for! Lets dive into a detailed review to see what this model brings in 2025. Design and Exterior Highlights One look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO, especially in black, and its clear that this car is a head-turner. Its sporty design elements stand out with: Chrome Accents: The grille and headlamp finish feature stylish chrome highlights. Projector Headlamps with LED DRLs: These enhance visibility and aesthetics. Diamond-Cut Alloy Wheels: The 16-inch alloys add a premium feel to the vehicle. Safety Ratings: With six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating, this vehicle excels in safety. Roof Rails & Spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler give it a bold presence on the road. Although the car lacks front parking sensors and certain accessories come as add-ons, its robust styling and road presence more than makes up for these minor drawbacks. Interior Comfort and Technology Step inside the Mahindra XUV 3XO, and youll be greeted by a modern and comfortable cabin: Dual-Tone Dashboard: Soft-touch materials on the doors and satin finishes on the levers add a premium touch. Advanced Infotainment System: A 10.25-inch infotainment display paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster ensures seamless access to information and entertainment. Steering Controls: A three-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel includes controls for cruise and infotainment systems. Comfort Features: From automatic climate control with dual-zone functionality to wireless charging and a vanity mirror with illumination, convenience is a priority. While its disappointing that the glovebox isnt cooled or illuminated, the XUV 3XO compensates with thoughtful features like rear AC vents, adjustable headrests, and ample storage options. Performance and Engine Specifications Under the hood, the Mahindra XUV 3XO packs a punch with its turbocharged petrol engine: Engine Options: It comes with a 1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque. Transmission: Choose between manual and automatic transmissions, depending on your driving preference. Fuel Efficiency: Mahindra claims an ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l, though real-world figures hover around 14-15 km/l. The cars ride quality, stability, and safety features like ABS with EBD, electronic stability control, and tyre pressure monitoring ensure a secure driving experience. Practicality and Storage With a 364-liter boot space, the XUV 3XO offers decent storage capacity. However, operating the boot can feel a bit cumbersome due to its electromagnetic button placement. The spare wheel, tool kit, and first-aid essentials are neatly arranged but require some effort to access. Final Thoughts The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an impressive contender in the compact SUV segment. While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! Add it to your shortlist and take it for a spin to see if its the perfect fit for your needs. Dont forget to share your thoughts on this versatile vehicle in the comments section! 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: Your Complete Guide Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Moreover, with the ADRENOX Connect technology, you can control your cars features through y', 'images': [{'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'alt_text': 'image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}, {'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/Mahindra_XUV_3_XO_1_50764da01b.png', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra', 'width': '740', 'height': '400', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 5}, {'url': 'https://www.autocarindia.com/car-reviews/mahindra-xuv-3xo-review-feature-and-power-packed-compact-suv-431439', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 6}, {'url': 'https://www.cars24.com/new-cars/mahindra/xuv-3xo/specifications/', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 7}, {'url': 'https://www.spinny.com/cars/mahindra/xuv-3xo/', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 8}]

nodes.description: Fetch details about the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle from reliable online sources.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch details about the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle from reliable online sources, including the official Mahindra website, reputable automotive news sites, and credible review platforms. Focus on extracting information regarding engine specifications, dimensions, safety features, technology, interior and exterior design elements, and any unique selling points.

The Mahindra XUV 3XO might be the car youre searching for! Lets dive into a detailed review to see what this model brings in 2025. Design and Exterior Highlights One look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO, especially in black, and its clear that this car is a head-turner. Its sporty design elements stand out with: Chrome Accents: The grille and headlamp finish feature stylish chrome highlights. Projector Headlamps with LED DRLs: These enhance visibility and aesthetics. Diamond-Cut Alloy Wheels: The 16-inch alloys add a premium feel to the vehicle. Safety Ratings: With six airbags and a five-star Global NCAP safety rating, this vehicle excels in safety. Roof Rails & Spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler give it a bold presence on the road. Although the car lacks front parking sensors and certain accessories come as add-ons, its robust styling and road presence more than makes up for these minor drawbacks. Interior Comfort and Technology Step inside the Mahindra XUV 3XO, and youll be greeted by a modern and comfortable cabin: Dual-Tone Dashboard: Soft-touch materials on the doors and satin finishes on the levers add a premium touch. Advanced Infotainment System: A 10.25-inch infotainment display paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster ensures seamless access to information and entertainment. Steering Controls: A three-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel includes controls for cruise and infotainment systems. Comfort Features: From automatic climate control with dual-zone functionality to wireless charging and a vanity mirror with illumination, convenience is a priority. While its disappointing that the glovebox isnt cooled or illuminated, the XUV 3XO compensates with thoughtful features like rear AC vents, adjustable headrests, and ample storage options. Performance and Engine Specifications Under the hood, the Mahindra XUV 3XO packs a punch with its turbocharged petrol engine: Engine Options: It comes with a 1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque. Transmission: Choose between manual and automatic transmissions, depending on your driving preference. Fuel Efficiency: Mahindra claims an ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l, though real-world figures hover around 14-15 km/l. The cars ride quality, stability, and safety features like ABS with EBD, electronic stability control, and tyre pressure monitoring ensure a secure driving experience. Practicality and Storage With a 364-liter boot space, the XUV 3XO offers decent storage capacity. However, operating the boot can feel a bit cumbersome due to its electromagnetic button placement. The spare wheel, tool kit, and first-aid essentials are neatly arranged but require some effort to access. Final Thoughts The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an impressive contender in the compact SUV segment. While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment.
